numbered_ace_sentences: 5. In basketball, around 80% of players are people of color.
6. In football, around 80% of players are people of color.
7. In soccer, around 60% of players are people of color.
8. In baseball, around 40% of players are people of color.
9. The majority of head coaches are not people of color.
10. I wonder why football has a majority of players who are people of color.
11. I wonder why basketball has a majority of players who are people of color.
12. I wonder why soccer has a majority of players who are people of color.
13. I wonder why baseball does not have a majority of players who are people of color.
14. Our community is impacted by these facts.
15. These facts show that people of color have an equal opportunity to be a player in some sports.
16. These facts show that people of color have a lower chance to be in positions of power.
17. The statistics for head coaches show this lower chance.
18. The title of the graph is: How diverse are Major League sports?
